outcome: If you start coughing more, do you smoke less than you usually do?
Do you try to smoke less during times you smoke than you would like?
How often do you refuse having an offered cigarette because you are concerned about your health?
Do you buy exactly the same smoking product every time?
Do you deliberately select cigarettes with less cancerogenous substances(eg. tar/nicotine level)
When you have smoked too much, do you smoke less than usual the following days?
Do you  deliberately smoke less for health reasons?
How often do you try not to smoke often because of health reasons?
How often do you try not to smoke in the evening because you want to cough less?
Do you take into account your cough when you smoke?
Do you have the desire to smoke when you are irritated?
Do you desire to smoke when you have nothing to do?
Do you desire to smoke when you are depressed or discouraged?
Do you have a desire to smoke when you are feeling lonely?
Do you have a desire to smoke when somebody lets you down?
Do you have a desire to smoke when you are cross?
Do you have a desire to smoke when you are approaching something unpleasant to happen?
Do you desire to smoke when you are anxious, worried or tense?
Do you desire to smoke when things are going against you or when things have gone wrong?
Do you desire to smoke when you are frightened?
Do you desire to smoke when you are disappointed?
Do you have a desire to smoke when you are emotionally upset?
Do you have a desire to smoke when you are bored or restless?
